tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE player_rankings (
    player_id INT,
    player_name VARCHAR(50),
    games_played INT,
    total_points INT,
    ranking_position INT
);

CREATE TABLE rankings (
    ranking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    ranking_position INT,
    ranking_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES players(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE match_results (
    match_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player1_id INT,
    player2_id INT,
    winner_id INT,
    loser_id INT,
    match_date TIMESTAMP
);
CREATE TABLE player (player_id INT PRIMARY KEY, player_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, player_score INT);

CREATE TABLE game (game_id INT PRIMARY KEY, game_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, game_date DATE NOT NULL, winning_player_id INT, losing_player_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (winning_player_id) REFERENCES player(player_id), FOREIGN KEY (losing_player_id) REFERENCES player(player_id));
CREATE TABLE ranking (ranking_id INT PRIMARY KEY, player_id INT, rank_position INT, rank_date DATE, FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES player(player_id));

CREATE TABLE performance (performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY, player_id INT, game_id INT, performance_rating INT, performance_date DATE, FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES player(player_id), FOREIGN KEY (game_id) REFERENCES game(game_id));

CREATE TABLE Matches (
    match_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    player1_id INT NOT NULL,
    player2_id INT NOT NULL,
    winner_id INT,
    match_date TIMESTAMP
);
